long_description: The OtterBox iPhone(R) 5 Defender Series case is a slim and stylish way to give your iPhone 5 unparalleled protection from bumps, shocks, scratches, dings and dust. This case offers 3 layers of protection: a high-impact polycarbonate shell is combined with a shock-absorbent silicone skin and a built-in membrane to protect the touch screen. Case provides full access to all buttons, ports and functions of your iPhone 5-use the camera, charge your phone or make a call. Includes a belt holster that doubles as a viewing stand; face the phone outward for easy access or face it inward for maximum protection. Rubber plugs cover all the main openings of the device and help to prevent damage from lint, dust and grit. Note: The OtterBox iPhone 5 Defender Series case does not protect against water.
short_description: The OtterBox iPhone(R) 5 Defender Series case is a slim and stylish way to give your iPhone 5 unparalleled protection from bumps, shocks, scratches, dings and dust.
